extendedInfo.description: Get rewards for not texting while driving! Drive Alive is an app that monitors your application usage while it is running to give you credit for being a safe driver. This is the Lite version of Drive Alive and contains advertisements that appear after a trip has been completed.Directions:1. Before driving, open Drive Alive and log in.2. To make sure you receive credit for all your time spent driving, wait for the app to get a GPS connection.3. Drive!4. After coming to a complete stop, press the End Trip button.After that, the application will verify that you are stopped and send the trip data.Features:â¢ If you receive credit for a trip you will become eligible for rewards. (Cash, discounts, and more!)â¢ Receive some rewards instantly! No building up points! Just one trip could mean money in your PayPal account.â¢ Easy to use: Simply run the app, drive safely, press End Trip, and profit!â¢ Drive Alive will NEVER block you from using any of your phone's features.The following will cause loss of trip credit:â¢ Driving while the application is ending.â¢ Answering the phone.â¢ Opening other applications. (This includes texting!)â¢ Pressing the 'Home' button while the GPS is connecting or after a trip has started.â¢ Locking the screen.â¢ Pressing the 'Home' button or locking the screen after pressing 'Stop Trip' but before letting the app finish sending trip data.â¢ NOTE: It's possible that some alarms/pop-up notifications will cause a loss of trip credit. You may want to disable these prior to starting a trip if you have trouble.The following will NOT cause loss of trip credit:â¢ Receiving a call/text, but not responding.â¢ Letting the phone screen turn off by going idle. (The screen will not lock automatically while a trip is active.)â¢ Touching the screen without closing the app or opening a new one.Remember, continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.For more information, visit www.drivealiveapp.com.Please feel free to email DriveAliveApp@gmail.com with any questions, suggestions, or requests you may have.If you have any problems while running the app, please send an email to DriveAliveApp@gmail.com.Drive Alive â It's your call. Don't answer it.*IMPORTANT NOTES FOR PREVIOUS-VERSION USERS*If you downloaded this update, you will temporarily be unable to add new trips to your old account. This is because our account system has changed. You have two options:1. Create a new account through the built-in Create Account page to use immediately.2. Email DriveAliveApp@gmail.com with subject line containing 'Update Old Drive Alive Account' and we'll help you out. Make sure you're emailing from the Contact Email you signed up with.We're also working on a way to get our previous-version users access to the ad-free version of the app. We haven't forgotten about you. Hang in there.

reviews.title: It\'s alright I guess
reviews.comment: I haven\'t really gotten paid for any trips. I can\'t help when people call me. It says application went to backround everytime someone texts me or calls me. Would give 5 stars if it was fixed!
reviews.author: Aziz Qadeer

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I\'ve been having this app for more than a week and always use it and haven\'t had anything in my PayPal yet
reviews.author: Nilson Flores

reviews.title: Not worth the time
reviews.comment: Twice I\'ve finished a trip and 20 minutes later it was still \"sending data\" and I had to fc. Not worth that kind of time.
reviews.author: Sharon R.

reviews.title: Great communication!!!
reviews.comment: Had a problem with app but got prompt response and now it works better than ever!!!
reviews.author: Kevin Robertson

reviews.title: There\'s no reason not to use this
reviews.comment: Great idea. Was suspicious at first, as everyone else probably was to, but you really do get paid to drive smart and not stupid. Excellent app. Thank You
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mark ables
reviews.comment: Gonna give a 4 star on the fact they contacted me to ensure correct use. Gonna give a 5 when I pull my next trip and see it work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: Everyone needs to use this. Put down the phone and DRIVE the car!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HTC evo3d
reviews.comment: Wow just started using it and u got a dollar, getting paid to be safe amazing..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Legit
reviews.comment: It pays for some of the gas! At the expense of not using the phone for the ride.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Works brilliantly, earnt $2 the first time I used it! Would be nice to have some \'allowed\' apps (speedos, nav, music etc) that wouldn\'t interfere with rewards.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mo money, mo money
reviews.comment: I\'ve had it for almost a full week and I have earned $3.00.  Love it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Made 1 dollar first trip..cool app keep up the good work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic!!!
reviews.comment: Ive had this app for some time. But now i remember to use it i am so pleased with the results. Maybe just $1 here and there, but those dollers will soon add up ;)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Awesome app!  Although, I\'m still trying to get used to remember to turn it on when I get in the car.  I will in time!  Already been rewarded!  :)  Great service too!  Tim\'s responses are very quick and informative!  I would surely recommend this app!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Angela
reviews.comment: Got $3 on my first trip :) yeah. Had a small issue & when emailed it to Tim he responded very fast & was very detailed response. He is very polite & understanding. I highly recommend this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very cool
reviews.comment: Great idea, reward for not texting and driving. Easy to use app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome App
reviews.comment: Just started using it and I\'ve already earned a $1.00. Great way to get us to stop putting our lives and the lives of others in danger!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Idea
reviews.comment: Had to uninstall it due to it eating up my battery.  I had uninstalled then reinstalled and problem continued
reviews.author: A Google User
